resources.string:
-- IF YOU WANT TO STOP PLAYING NEWS THEN CLOSE THE APPLICATION
-- EVERYTIME YOU TAP ON PLAY BUTTON , SYSTEM WILL REPEAT WHOLE NEWS WHATEVER NUMBER YOU PRESSED
-- BY TAPPING ON PLAY BUTTON IF SYSTEM NEVER SPEAK THEN RESTART THE APPLICATION
-- CONNECT TO INTERNET TO LISTEN NEWS
-- FEEL FREE TO USE THIS APPLICATION

-- RAHUL PARMAR--
